section.title: Known Issues in version 5.0.0
section.para: Following is a list of known issues at the time of release.

listitem.para: When installing JBoss Developer Studio 5 on Mac OS X, if you are running Java 7 you will only be able to install the 64bit version of JBoss Developer Studio. The current workaround o install the 32bit version is to use Java 6.
